D. Ensure that the RDP plug-in is installed on the VPN gateway
questions.answer: D. Ensure that the RDP plug-in is installed on the VPN gateway

choices.C: Instruct the user to reconnect to the VPN gateway
choices.A: Ensure that the RDP2 plug-in is installed on the VPN gateway

discussion.content:
RDP plug-in: This is the original plug-in created that contains both the Java and ActiveX Client.
RDP2 plug-in: Due to changes within the RDP protocol, the Proper Java RDP Client was updated in order to support Microsoft Windows 2003 Terminal Servers and Windows Vista Terminal Servers.
Tip: The latest RDP plug-in combines both RDP and RDP2 protocols. As a result the RDP2 plug-in is obsolete. It is recommended to utilize the most-recent version of the RDP plug-in.

questions.question_text:
What is a possible reason for the error message?
Router(config)#aaa server?% Unrecognized command
questions.answer_ET: D. The router is a new device on which the aaa new-model command must be applied before continuing
questions.answer: D. The router is a new device on which the aaa new-model command must be applied before continuing
D. Smart tunnels require the client to have the application installed locally

choices.B: Smart tunnels support all operating systems
choices.C: Smart tunnels offer better performance than port forwarding
choices.A: Smart tunnels can be used by clients that do not have administrator privileges

questions.question_text: Which statements about smart tunnels on a Cisco firewall are true? (Choose two)
questions.answer_ET: D. Smart tunnels require the client to have the application installed locally

discussion.content:
AC
Smart tunnel access lets a client TCP-based application use a browser-based VPN connection to access a service. It offers the following advantages to users, compared to plug-ins and the legacy technology, port forwarding:
– Smart tunnel offers better performance than plug-ins.
– Unlike port forwarding, smart tunnel simplifies the user experience by not requiring the user connection of the local application to the local port.
– Unlike port forwarding, smart tunnel does not require users to have administrator privileges.
